general.byline: Client Services in San Diego, He/him
general.about: Client services professional with over 16 years of experience in digital/web/e-commerce. Passionate about customer experience and technology.

workExperience.heading: Group Account Director, Rec & Leisure at Togetherwork
workExperience.title: Group Account Director, Rec & Leisure

workExperience.heading: Director of Strategic Accounts at Miva Inc
workExperience.description:
* Improved client satisfaction and retention by leading all professional and strategic e-commerce service engagements, serving as a trusted advisor for enterprise merchant accounts, and providing tailored solutions for their business needs.

* Increased annual revenue to $2.5 M by being responsible for all renewals, upsell opportunities, and new sales, as well as negotiating contracts and closing deals with high-profile clients.

* Managed and mentored a team of Account Managers, Project Managers, and UX Designers, overseeing their performance, providing feedback, and facilitating their professional development.
workExperience.title: Director of Strategic Accounts

workExperience.heading: Account Director at Miva Inc.
workExperience.description:
* Managed a team of 5 Account Managers and achieved 100% NRR by coaching them on best practices, monitoring their performance, and resolving any issues or conflicts with clients.

* Defined and implemented department strategies, staffing, and financial decisions with the SVP of Client Services, optimizing the efficiency, productivity, and profitability of the Professional Services department.

* Prepared and executed account plans, QBRs, SOWs, and strategies for key e-commerce clients, identifying their needs, goals, and opportunities, and aligning them with the company’s products and services.
workExperience.title: Account Director

workExperience.heading: Senior Account Manager at Miva Inc
workExperience.description:
* Directed and presented QBRs and SOWs alongside the Account Management team, showcasing the value and impact of the company’s e-commerce solutions, securing 100% of Pro Services renewals.

* Strategized and directed the relationship with 10-12 enterprise e-commerce clients, delivering high-quality service, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction, resulting in a 90% retention rate and a 25% increase in revenue.

* Coordinated with interdepartmental leads (Product, Marketing, Sales, SaaS, etc.) to define working agreements and implement new processes, improving efficiency, collaboration, and communication across the organization.
workExperience.title: Senior Account Manager

workExperience.heading: Account Manager at Pacific Digital
workExperience.description:
* Planned and led strategy and deliverables with the PM, creatives, copywriters, marketing, SEO, and PR teams, ensuring alignment with client goals, delivering projects on time and within budget, and measuring and reporting on their impact.

* Managed SEO, Marketing, and Advertising deliverables for 6 lines of business, optimizing their online presence, increasing their traffic, and enhancing their conversions.

* Managed and grew the relationship of Expedia Travel Group in the Americas region and Australia/New Zealand, delivering high-quality service, and exceeding client expectations, leading to a 25% improvement in key performance indicators on Expedia.com landing pages.
workExperience.title: Account Manager

workExperience.heading: Account Manager at Miva Inc
workExperience.description:
* Advised enterprise clients on current industry trends and managed relationships with 3rd party vendors, ensuring alignment with client goals, optimizing costs, and enhancing quality.

* Implemented and recommended e-commerce initiatives that doubled the revenue growth of merchants, demonstrating the value and impact of the company’s solutions and services.

* Supported clients with e-commerce and web best practices to drive revenue, conversions, and other business goals, providing guidance, feedback, and training, leading to continued engagement in the Professional Services group.
workExperience.title: Account Manager

workExperience.heading: Account Manager at Santex
workExperience.description:
* Grew software services for outsourced software staff based in LATAM (Argentina and Peru) by 20% in one year, delivering high-quality solutions, exceeding client expectations,

* Fostered and strengthened client relationships to ensure continued annual renewal of services, achieving a 95% retention rate and a 10% increase in referrals.

* Managed a portfolio of 10-12 high-touch clients and exceeded a quota of $2M in annual invoicing by 15%, securing long-term partnerships, negotiating contracts, and resolving issues.
workExperience.title: Account Manager

workExperience.heading: Systems Administrator at Santex
workExperience.description:
* Managed VMWare servers and LAMP stack (GIT, MySQL, Apache, Nginx, SOLR, etc.)

* Configured production client servers, and applied performance updates.

* Coordinated production deployment of client sites to 3rd party hosting.

* Executed company-wide migration to Google Apps from POP3 mail.
workExperience.title: Systems Administrator

workExperience.heading: Project Manager at Santex
workExperience.description:
* Prepared project plans and client timelines for digital agency client web projects.

* Managed specialized web projects (OScommerce, Magento, WordPress, Drupal, custom web development, etc.)

* Oversaw a team of offshore developers and creatives based in Latin America.

* Supported the sales process as a technical SME with the Sales team.
workExperience.title: Project Manager

workExperience.heading: Product Manager at Santex
workExperience.description:
* Took in-house project/task management product to a closed beta and eventually to a public release.

* Planned and deployed 3 major version releases and several minor releases.

* Collected requirements from stakeholders.

* Produced technical requirements and documentation.

* Had complete ownership of the product, including requirements gathering, project planning, customer service, technical support, and more.
workExperience.title: Product Manager

workExperience.heading: Web Developer at Santex
workExperience.description:
* Web developer for an in-house project/task management application.

* Worked alongside a remote web development team in Argentina.

* Developed in PHP, MySQL, Smarty templates, JavaScript, and jQuery.
workExperience.title: Web Developer
